put.description: Create a mailbox of the selected user.

delete.description: Deleting a mailbox and its children

put.description: Updating per quotaroot mail count limitation

get.description: Reading per quotaroot mail count limitation

delete.description: Removing per quotaroot mail count limitation by updating to unlimited value
Removing per quotaroot size limitation by updating to unlimited value

put.description: Updating count and size at the same time

get.description: Reading count and size at the same time

as_timeline_entry.description: Describes a timeline entry for an activity stream

as_resource.description: a resource associated to an activity stream.

as_current_user.description: activity streams object which can be read by the current user

cl_common_member.description: a common description for members of a collaboration

cl_member.description: a member description for the collaboration

Profile.description: a JSON object containing a profile properties values

cm_value.description: defines a JSON object containing a value property

cm_tuple_id.description: defines a tuple identifier (12/24 hex length)

cm_uuid.description: defines a universal unique identifier (32/8-4-4-4-12 length)

cm_id.description: defines either a uuid or a tuple id

cm_tuple_properties.description: properties that define a tuple in a document

cm_op_tuple_properties.description: properties that define a tuple in a document

cm_urn_object.description: defines a urn as urn:object type:object id

cm_tuple_and_its_urn.description: defined from both its tuple and the according urn

cm_id_and_its_urn.description: defined from both its tuple and the according urn

cm_timestamps.description: defines an object containing a creation date

cm_document.description: properties returned when a document has been created.

cf_configuration.description: a JSON object containing a configuration

cf_module.description: a JSON object containing a module configuration

cf_module_with_keys.description: a JSON object containing a module to get modules configurations

msg_not_found.description: object returned when a message is not found

msg_query_response.description: refers either to a message document or to an error message

sa_platformadmin.description: a JSON object containing a platformadmin basic information

us_phone.description: a string describing the call number

as_resource.description:
OK.

The resource associated to an activity stream.

For now it can only be a collaboration.

as_unreadcount.description:
OK. Returns an object with :

_id: the activity stream uuid

unread_count: number of unread timeline entries'

schema.description: Object with the number of unread timeline entries

as_user.description: Get all the activity streams of the collaborations the current user can access.

autoconf.description: Ok. With the authenticated user autoconfiguration file

av_stream.description: Ok. With the stream of the avatar if found or a default avatar

Last-Modified.description: indicates the date and time at which the origin server believes the avatar was last modified.

cl_search.description: OK. With an array of collaborations where the given tuple is a member

cl_writable.description: OK. With an array of collaborations where the given tuple has write permission

cl_people.description: Ok. With the list of people.

X-ESN-Items-Count.description: The number of results for the request sent.

cl_members.description: Ok. With an array of {objectType} members.

X-ESN-Items-Count.description: The number of results for the request sent.

cl_is_member.description: Ok if the user defined by user_id is a member of the {objectType} collaboration of id {id}.

cl_requests.description: Ok. With an array of membership requests with user information.

cm_204.description: Action performed but no content in the body.

cm_400.description: Bad request. Invalid request body or parameters.

cm_401.description: Unauthorized. The user is not authenticated on the platform.

cm_403.description: Forbidden. The user does not have enough rights.

cm_412.description: Precondition failed. The number of bytes recoreded by the file storage service differs from the number of bytes given by the user agent.

cm_500.description: Internal server error - Something went bad on the server side.

ct_communities.description: OK.  With an array of communities for the given domain.

ct_error_conflict.description: Conflict. A community already exists with this title in the domain.

ct_avatar.description: OK. With the recorded image ID

ct_member.description: OK - Current user is a community member and user is a member.

cp_companies.description: Ok. With an array of companies where company is defined as name

cf_modules.description: Ok. With an array of modules configuration

ds_check.description:
OK. A connection can be established with the document store

Optionally with the username and the password to connect to the document store

dm_members.description: OK. With the list of members.

X-ESN-Items-Count.description: The number of results for the request sent.

dm_invitations.description: Accepted. The request has been received and an invitation will be sent to each email of the list.

fi_stream.description: OK. The file data will be streamed.

fi_error_conflict.description: Conflict. File is used and can not be deleted.

fl_user.description: Ok. With an array of users

X-ESN-Items-Count.description: The total number of items which fulfill the query.

i18n_catalog.description: Ok. With an object containing i18n translations

iv_create.description:
Created. With the invitation document.

It is up to the invitation handler implementation to deal with its validation.

jw_generate.description:
OK. With the encoded JWT.

The payload contains the user preferred email as 'sub'.

ldap_uss_content.description: Ok with the list of users.

lo_list.description: OK.  With an array of locales.

mailbox_created.description: OK. The mailbox now exists on the server.

mailbox_deleted.description: The mailbox now does not exist on the server

user_mailboxes_deleted.description: The user do not have mailboxes anymore

mailbox_404.description: The user name does not exist.

msg_list.description: OK. At least one message is found.

error.details: The message 123 can not be found

msg_create.description: Created. With the _id of the new message.

msg_vote.description: Ok. With the poll message updated.

nt_notifications.description: OK.  With an array of user notifications.

nt_notifications_index.description: OK.  With an array of user notifications.

nt_create.description: Created. With the array of created notifications.

oauth_document.description: Ok. With oauth client application of given id.

as_uuid.name: uuid
as_uuid.description: The identifier of the activity stream.

as_before.name: before
as_before.description: Determines the last activity ID of the stream. (this is the default)

as_after.name: after
as_after.description: Determines the previous activity ID of the stream.

as_limit.name: limit
as_limit.description: The maximum number of activities to include in the stream.

as_domainid.name: domainid
as_domainid.description: Optional identifier of the domain in which to get the communities activity streams.

as_writable.name: writable
as_writable.description: When set to true, get only activitystreams for which the user can publish into.

as_name.name: name
as_name.description: Get only streams where the attached resource match or contains the given name.

as_member.name: member
as_member.description: Get only the activitystreams where the current user is member of the linked collaboration.

av_type.name: type
av_type.description: The resource type to retrieve avatar from.

av_email.name: email
av_email.description: If objectType is 'user' or 'email' or if no objectType is given, the parameter value must be an email

av_id.name: id
av_id.description: If objectType is 'community', the parameter value is the id of the community. If the object type is 'image', the id is the image id.

av_format.name: format
av_format.description: If format is set to 'original', send back the original avatar which has been uploaded, else send back the 128px x 128px one.

av_if_modified_since.name: if_modified_since
av_if_modified_since.description: if the requested avatar has not been modified since the time specified in this field, the avatar will not be returned

av_mimetype.name: mimetype
av_mimetype.description: the MIME type of the avatar. Valid values are 'image/png', 'image/gif' and 'image/jpeg'

av_size.name: size
av_size.description:
the size, in bytes, of the POSTed image.

This size will be compared with the number of bytes recorded in the file storage service, thus ensuring that there were no data loss.

cl_search_type.name: search_type
cl_search_type.description: The type of member to look for.

cl_search_id.name: search_id
cl_search_id.description: The id of the member to look for

cl_user_id.name: user_id
cl_user_id.description: The id of the member to check

cl_invitable_object_type.name: object_type
cl_invitable_object_type.description: For the moment, can only be 'community'

cl_members_object_type.name: object_type
cl_members_object_type.description: For the moment, can only be 'community' or 'project'

cl_object_type_filter.name: object_type_filter
cl_object_type_filter.description:
Only show members of a certain object type, e.g. `user` or `community`.
If prefixed with an exclamation mark, the object type query will be inverted.

cl_object_id.name: id
cl_object_id.description: The id of the community or the project (for the moment)

cl_invitable_limit.name: limit
cl_invitable_limit.description: The number of people to return. This will only keep the N first people (where N=limit).

cl_limit.name: limit
cl_limit.description: The number of results to return. This will only keep the N first results (where N=limit).

cl_offset.name: offset
cl_offset.description:
Start the list of results after skipping N results (where N=offset).
For example, if the size of the results list is 100 and the offset is 50, the result list will contain only results from 50 to 99 (list index starts at index 0).

cl_search.name: search
cl_search.description:
Search the people "firstname", "lastname" and "email" fields in case insensitive and accent agnostic way.
Note that when there are more than one word in the search string (separated by one or more spaces), the search will become an AND.
For example: 'search=foo bar' will search members where firstname, lastname and email contain foo AND bar.

cl_withoutInvite.name: withoutInvite
cl_withoutInvite.description: Optional parameter which indicates if invitation workflow should be skipped when adding a member to a collaboration

ct_domain_id.name: domain_id
ct_domain_id.description: The id of the domain to fetch communities from.

ct_domain_ids.name: domain_ids
ct_domain_ids.description: The ids of the domains the community is linked to

ct_creator.name: search_id
ct_creator.description: The id of the user who created the search communities.

ct_title_search.name: title_search
ct_title_search.description: The title of a searched community. The title filter is case insensitive.

ct_noTitleCheck.name: noTitleCheck
ct_noTitleCheck.description: optional parameter to skip the title check when creating a community

cm_com_update.name: update
cm_com_update.description: parameters to update in the community (title, avatar, newMembers, deleteMembers)

cf_modules.name: modules
cf_modules.description: The list of modules configuration to update

cf_modules_with_keys.name: modules
cf_modules_with_keys.description: The list of modules to get configurations

ds_username.name: username
ds_username.description: The username used to connect to the database.

ds_password.name: title_search
ds_password.description: The password used to connect to the database.

dm_user_ids.name: userIds
dm_user_ids.description: Array of user ID to promoted as domain administrators

fi_mimetype.name: mimetype
fi_mimetype.description: The MIME type of the data being stored

fi_size.name: size
fi_size.description: The expected file size. This will be compared with the bytes received, ensuring there is no dataloss.

fl_limit.name: limit
fl_limit.description: The maximum number of users to include in the response.

fl_offset.name: offset
fl_offset.description: Start the list of results after skipping N results (where N=offset).

fl_id.name: id
fl_id.description: The id of the user to fetch follow data.

fl_tid.name: tid
fl_tid.description: The id of the user to follow/unfollow.

ldap_limit.name: limit
ldap_limit.description: The number of results to return. This will only keep the N first results (where N=limit).

ldap_search.name: search
ldap_search.description: Search the ldap's user fields in case insensitive and accent agnostic way.

lo_name.name: locale
lo_name.description: the name of the locale to get information from.

lg_passwordresetemail.name: passwordresetemail
lg_passwordresetemail.description: the email requesting the password reset

lg_passwordreset.name: passwordreset
lg_passwordreset.description: the new password of the user

lg_changepassword.name: changepassword
lg_changepassword.description: the old and new password of the user

username.name: username
username.description: The user that will be created mailbox on (the use must be full email address and should be an existing on user Resource)

mailboxName.name: mailboxName
mailboxName.description: The mailbox name should be created. It should not be empty, nor contain

msg_ids.name: ids
msg_ids.description: Identifiers of the messages to fetch.

msg_mail.name: mail
msg_mail.description: An email in rfc822 MIME format.

msg_share.name: share
msg_share.description: identify the source community/project of the original message and the targets where the message will be copied

nt_read.name: read
nt_read.description:
If true, show notifications marked as read.

If false, show only unread ones.

If all, show all.

nt_value.name: value
nt_value.description: the value to apply to the property of each notification

sa_set_type.name: type
sa_set_type.description: Type of the data to set platformadmin

sa_set_data.name: data
sa_set_data.description: User ID or email of the user you want to set as platformadmin

sa_unset_type.name: type
sa_unset_type.description: Type of the data to unset platformadmin

sa_unset_data.name: data
sa_unset_data.description: User ID or email of the platformadmin you want to unset

tl_limit.name: limit
tl_limit.description: The maximum number of timeline entries to include in the response.

tl_offset.name: offset
tl_offset.description: Start the list of results after skipping N results (where N=offset).

us_attribute_name.name: attribute_name
us_attribute_name.description: The attribute name of the element to update (firstname, lastname, ...)

us_attribute_value.name: attribute_value
us_attribute_value.description: The attribute value of the element to update

openpaas_auth.description: OAuth2 security scheme for the OpenPaaS API
